description: Author Nancy Nichols says that for men, cars signify adventure, power and strength. For women, they are about performing domestic duties; there was even a minivan prototype with a washer/dryer inside.
title: 'Women Behind the Wheel' explains how cars became a gendered technology

description: The Carters have it all — wealth, influence, critical cred — but they've never stopped chasing the approval of exclusive institutions like the Grammys. At this point, who are they fighting for?
title: Jay-Z and Beyoncé's blank space

description: Our most memorable and useful expert advice from Life Kit's March episodes, hand-picked by the editors.
title: Life Kit's tips of the month: On seafood labels, eye strain and sibling relationships

description: More than half of the Colorado River's water is used to grow crops, primarily livestock feed, a new study finds. The river and its users are facing tough decisions as the climate warms.
title: The Colorado River rarely reaches the sea. Here's why

description: Biden officials approved proposals for the U.S. census and federal surveys to change how Latinos are asked about their race and ethnicity and to add a checkbox for "Middle Eastern or North African."
title: Next U.S. census will have new boxes for 'Middle Eastern or North African,' 'Latino'

description: The Grand Alliance between Black and Jewish leaders, known largely for shared work on Civil Rights in the 1960s, has a complicated legacy--and an uncertain future between these communities.
title: Fractures in the Grand Alliance between Black and Jewish Americans

description: American artist Richard Serra died this week at the age of 85. Serra was world-renowned for his large-scale metal sculptures.
title: Photos: Remembering Richard Serra, a world-renowned 'poet' of metals

description: The South African singer brought a homegrown genre, amapiano, to new ears with a viral hit and a Grammy. With her debut album, she wants to prove the world is ready for a full-blown African pop star.
title: Tyla is the new face of African pop. She's aiming to take over the whole world
